mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO BASIC_XITEM(CODE, BUNR, BUMO, VENDOR, FIXLEVEL, DKAKU, KAKU, KOTEIM, STZAIK, LEAD, KOUKI, HOJYUU, KURIAGE, JCODE, KOUTHIKI, HOKAN, NEXTBUMO, LOTH, LOTS, LOTS2, HIMOKU, FURYOU, LEAD2, TANIKOUKI, KOUKI2, LINKSLIP, NOKANRI, PICKKU, PICKLOTS, SPICKKU, HCTENKANRI, CHANGEKAKU, MAXZAIK, MINZAIK, STDCOUNT, EMACOUNT, ZAIKMIN, TEMPZAIKMIN, MAXLOTH, MAXLOTS, LOTHT, LOTKIKAN, FLATJYUN, STZAIKEND, UCHIKIRI, MATOMEH, CALEM, HIKIKU, HIKILOTS, MINASIKUBU, MINASIGENDO, COMPO, DOLOTBUNKATU, PCAPA, TANKAH, SSUMPRICE, STUMIPRICE, PKET, GAKUJ, KANZANZ, KANZANP, KANZANZA, KANZANJ, KANZANV, KANZANK, TANI2, DFAKU, DFAKU2, DFJKU, DFJKU2, KENSA, KDESNAME, SLNOHD, SETGRP, SETGRPRATIO, KIGENKUBU, KIGEN, ACTLIMIT, HIKILIMIT, NOTE, SYSNOTE, INPUTDATE, INPUTUSER) VALUES
( #{item.code}, #{item.bunr}, #{item.bumo}, #{item.vendor}, #{item.fixlevel}, #{item.dkaku}, #{item.kaku}, #{item.koteim}, #{item.stzaik}, #{item.lead}, #{item.kouki}, #{item.hojyuu}, #{item.kuriage}, #{item.jcode}, #{item.kouthiki}, #{item.hokan}, #{item.nextbumo}, #{item.loth}, #{item.lots}, #{item.lots2}, #{item.himoku}, #{item.furyou}, #{item.lead2}, #{item.tanikouki}, #{item.kouki2}, #{item.linkslip}, #{item.nokanri}, #{item.pickku}, #{item.picklots}, #{item.spickku}, #{item.hctenkanri}, #{item.changekaku}, #{item.maxzaik}, #{item.minzaik}, #{item.stdcount}, #{item.emacount}, #{item.zaikmin}, #{item.tempzaikmin}, #{item.maxloth}, #{item.maxlots}, #{item.lotht}, #{item.lotkikan}, #{item.flatjyun}, #{item.stzaikend}, #{item.uchikiri}, #{item.matomeh}, #{item.calem}, #{item.hikiku}, #{item.hikilots}, #{item.minasikubu}, #{item.minasigendo}, #{item.compo}, #{item.dolotbunkatu}, #{item.pcapa}, #{item.tankah}, #{item.ssumprice}, #{item.stumiprice}, #{item.pket}, #{item.gakuj}, #{item.kanzanz}, #{item.kanzanp}, #{item.kanzanza}, #{item.kanzanj}, #{item.kanzanv}, #{item.kanzank}, #{item.tani2}, #{item.dfaku}, #{item.dfaku2}, #{item.dfjku}, #{item.dfjku2}, #{item.kensa}, #{item.kdesname}, #{item.slnohd}, #{item.setgrp}, #{item.setgrpratio}, #{item.kigenkubu}, #{item.kigen}, #{item.actlimit}, #{item.hikilimit}, #{item.note}, #{item.sysnote}, #{item.inputdate}, #{item.inputuser} )
mapper.update: update BASIC_XITEM set CODE = #{code}, BUNR = #{bunr}, BUMO = #{bumo}, VENDOR = #{vendor}, FIXLEVEL = #{fixlevel}, DKAKU = #{dkaku}, KAKU = #{kaku}, KOTEIM = #{koteim}, STZAIK = #{stzaik}, LEAD = #{lead}, KOUKI = #{kouki}, HOJYUU = #{hojyuu}, KURIAGE = #{kuriage}, JCODE = #{jcode}, KOUTHIKI = #{kouthiki}, HOKAN = #{hokan}, NEXTBUMO = #{nextbumo}, LOTH = #{loth}, LOTS = #{lots}, LOTS2 = #{lots2}, HIMOKU = #{himoku}, FURYOU = #{furyou}, LEAD2 = #{lead2}, TANIKOUKI = #{tanikouki}, KOUKI2 = #{kouki2}, LINKSLIP = #{linkslip}, NOKANRI = #{nokanri}, PICKKU = #{pickku}, PICKLOTS = #{picklots}, SPICKKU = #{spickku}, HCTENKANRI = #{hctenkanri}, CHANGEKAKU = #{changekaku}, MAXZAIK = #{maxzaik}, MINZAIK = #{minzaik}, STDCOUNT = #{stdcount}, EMACOUNT = #{emacount}, ZAIKMIN = #{zaikmin}, TEMPZAIKMIN = #{tempzaikmin}, MAXLOTH = #{maxloth}, MAXLOTS = #{maxlots}, LOTHT = #{lotht}, LOTKIKAN = #{lotkikan}, FLATJYUN = #{flatjyun}, STZAIKEND = #{stzaikend}, UCHIKIRI = #{uchikiri}, MATOMEH = #{matomeh}, CALEM = #{calem}, HIKIKU = #{hikiku}, HIKILOTS = #{hikilots}, MINASIKUBU = #{minasikubu}, MINASIGENDO = #{minasigendo}, COMPO = #{compo}, DOLOTBUNKATU = #{dolotbunkatu}, PCAPA = #{pcapa}, TANKAH = #{tankah}, SSUMPRICE = #{ssumprice}, STUMIPRICE = #{stumiprice}, PKET = #{pket}, GAKUJ = #{gakuj}, KANZANZ = #{kanzanz}, KANZANP = #{kanzanp}, KANZANZA = #{kanzanza}, KANZANJ = #{kanzanj}, KANZANV = #{kanzanv}, KANZANK = #{kanzank}, TANI2 = #{tani2}, DFAKU = #{dfaku}, DFAKU2 = #{dfaku2}, DFJKU = #{dfjku}, DFJKU2 = #{dfjku2}, KENSA = #{kensa}, KDESNAME = #{kdesname}, SLNOHD = #{slnohd}, SETGRP = #{setgrp}, SETGRPRATIO = #{setgrpratio}, KIGENKUBU = #{kigenkubu}, KIGEN = #{kigen}, ACTLIMIT = #{actlimit}, HIKILIMIT = #{hikilimit}, NOTE = #{note}, SYSNOTE = #{sysnote}, INPUTDATE = #{inputdate}, INPUTUSER = #{inputuser} WHERE CODE = #{code} and BUMO = #{bumo}
